Body:
responses.add(responses.GET, 'https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/rest/login',
    body='{"token": "foobar"}', status=200, content_type='application/json',
    match_querystring=True)
bugzilla = Bugsy('foo', 'bar')
try:
    bugzilla.put('foo')
    assert 1 == 0, 'Should have thrown an error about type when calling put'
except BugsyException as e:
    assert str(e
        ) == 'Message: Please pass in a Bug object when posting to Bugzilla Code: None'
responses.activate
